channel.title: The Family Guy Review
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/
channel.description:
I will discuss episodes from Family Guy and give my thoughts about it. I will also do character bios, Q&A's, and anything else in between there. Check out the new site at www.famguyreview.com
If you have any questions or comments send an email at: info@famguyreview.com This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:author: wolf
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Family Guy Review
channel.itunes:summary:
I will discuss episodes from Family Guy and give my thoughts about it. I will also do character bios, Q&A's, and anything else in between there. Check out the new site at www.famguyreview.com

channel.itunes:keywords: Family Guy, Comedy, Stewie, Brian, Peter, Lois, Meg, Chris, Fox, Joe, Cleveland, Mike, Glen, Herbert, Tom, Tucker, Asian, Green, Red, Beer, Rhode Island
